episode_event_general_yo_mizuki/6701_100:
Let me introduce some of my friends to you!
This is Lana and Kiawe!
And over here we have Elio and Selene!
Alola! I just heard a lot about you!

Everyone was just saying that you’d do really well
in the trials they’re setting up on Pasio,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].

Oh, you probably don’t know what these
trials are...

They’re part of a tradition in Alola called the
island challenge! Basically, all children go through
it and complete a bunch of trials!

And we, the Trial Captains, are the ones who
decide what kinds of trials they are!

I guess it’s similar to gathering badges in
other regions.

Yes. However, it’s not just your skills in battle that
get tested.

It’s gonna be a new, updated version of the trials
we had on Akala Island. We’re calling them the
Pasio trials!
episode_event_general_yo_mizuki/6801_103:
This might be even larger
than Melemele Island!
episode_event_general_yo_mizuki/6801_100:
Did you know that Pasio is actually an artificial
island made by people?
Wait, so it’s just like Aether Paradise?

Well...it might be a little different, but isn’t it
amazing people were able to make something
this huge?

We might get lost here if we don’t have anyone to
show us around...
episode_event_general_yo_mizuki/6401_120:
OK! Time to go exploring!
I wonder what we’ll see!
episode_event_general_yo_mizuki/6501_120:
We made it! I wonder where
we should go next!
